SEARCH
Package user

Class Courier

java.lang.Object
user.User
user.Person
user.Courier
public class Courier extends Person
Class representing a Courier in the system. A Courier is a type of user who can deliver orders. It extends the Person class and includes additional attributes such as position, phone number, delivery counter, and duty status.
Author:
Aymane Adib

  • Constructor Details

    • Courier

      public Courier(String name, String surname, String username, String password, String phoneNumber, Location position) throws BadUserCreationException
      Constructor for Courier. Initializes the courier with the provided details.
      Parameters:
      name - name of the courier,
      surname - surname of the courier,
      username - username of the courier,
      password - password of the courier,
      phoneNumber - phone number of the courier,
      position - current location of the courier.
      Throws:
      BadUserCreationException - if the phone number is already used by another account.
